name: Project Trap
description:
Project Trap is NOT associated with any titles with similar font.

You play as an unnamed man as you walk and interact your way out of a strange and creepy yet familiar looking house.

This is an earl;y build to showcase a little knowledge of the engine GB Studio by Chris Maltby.

Try to bear with the humor and theme, thank you for checking it out.

Controls:

Up - Up Arrow / W  
Down - Down Arrow / S  
Left - Left Arrow / A  
Right - Right Arrow / D  
A - Alt / Z / J  
B - Ctrl / K / X  
Start - Enter  
Select - Shift  

Web version Update: 

-Made web game version a stand-alone game.
Officially called PROJECT TRAP THE RADIO EVENT.
You can finish it in one sitting.
-Updated the ending screens, and added a secret ending.
(Granted you must find the secret trigger first and get the good ending to see it.)
-Updated the Start button.(Now it has the Save and Load functions.)

-Updated the final build {Project Trap Final Version}
(Update a new event after completion of previous game.)
-Updated the Menu button.
(Please report any bugs or glitches found in game.)

Stay updated by following me.
Thanks for the visit and support.
Consider donating for future development and games.

God Bless your beautiful soul.
